overview: Rotten Love is the Brain Child of Swedish/Polish Horror Queen Sarah Giercksky and First Time Director Xander Turian.  After a hard day of work, a visibly stressed young man by the name of Leo, heads home to find that something is disturbingly wrong.
tagline: After a hard day of work, a visibly stressed young man by the name of Leo, heads home to find that something is disturbingly wrong.
title: Rotten Love
